casebody.data:
IN RE: RADCLIFF 16P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 28, 2019 John F. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, James E. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, Madeline J. Trilling, Attorney at Law, Concord, for Johnson, Michael. Amy Purwin Hunt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Wells Fargo Bank, N.A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2019 by Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of February 2019."
